TestReportSteps.testObjective: To Verify that the updated crash record is listed in the audit trail page
TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Verify that in the audit trail report the updated field in the ARF is listed with correct old and new values.Capture Screenshot
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to see in audit trail report the updated field in the ARF with correct old and new values
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to see in audit trail report the updated field in the ARF with correct old and new values
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to see in audit trail report the updated field in the ARF with correct old and new values
